# jordanExtra

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

jordanExtra contains some additional functions that did not feel like they were general enough to belong in [`jordan`](github.com/jmbarbone/jordan).



## Installation

You can install the development version of jordanExtra from  with:

``` r
devtools::isntall_github("jmbarbone/jordanExtra")
```
